sp_instance_link.title: Reportar Bugs

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_instance"><sp_instance_link action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><color>default</color><css>/* Estilo base para o widget */
.iconlink {
    padding: 3px 0;
}

.iconlink a {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
}

/* Título branco (prioridade máxima) */
.title-white {
    color: white !important;
    margin: 10px 0 !important;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.title-white:hover {
    transform: scale(1.1);
}

/* Gradiente vermelho → roxo APENAS para o glyph */
.glyph.custom-gradient { /* Adicione a classe "custom-gradient" ao elemento do glyph */
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, #FF0000, #800080) !important; /* Vermelho → Roxo */
    -webkit-background-clip: text !important;
    background-clip: text !important;
    color: transparent !important;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent !important; /* Garante compatibilidade com Font Awesome */
}

/* Centralização e efeito de hover do glyph */
.glyph {
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    display: inline-block; /* Necessário para aplicar gradiente */
}

.glyph:hover {
    transform: scale(1.1);
}</css><glyph>bug</glyph><id/><kb_article/><kb_category/><kb_topic/><order>1</order><roles/><sc_cat_item display_value="Bug Report">d9d9d5de839022109566f7b6feaad330</sc_cat_item><sc_category/><short_description/><size>md</size><sp_column display_value="1">6caa29df839422109566f7b6feaad354</sp_column><sp_page display_value="sc_cat_item">9f12251147132100ba13a5554ee490f4</sp_page><sp_widget/><sys_class_name>sp_instance_link</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-03-21 13:32:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>23e1cea783d022109566f7b6feaad396</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reportar Bugs</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1523172_skill_up">6938717783b712109566f7b6feaad3b9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">6938717783b712109566f7b6feaad3b9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_instance_link_23e1cea783d022109566f7b6feaad396</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-03-21 14:15:36</sys_updated_on><title>Reportar Bugs</title><type>sc_cat_item</type><url/><widget_parameters><![CDATA[{

	}
}]]></widget_parameters></sp_instance_link><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=23e1cea783d022109566f7b6feaad396"/></record_update>
